Package com.pandora.controllers

package com.pandora.controllers
Provides controllers for handling various HTTP endpoints related to biogeochemistry in freshwater environments within PANDORA. These controllers facilitate interactions with the system, including initiating cell calculations, managing DIC (Dissolved Inorganic Carbon) and DOC (Dissolved Organic Carbon) bean statuses, retrieving information about rivers, and obtaining details about available species.

The package includes the following controllers:

  • CellController:

    Manages the handling of HTTP POST requests for cell calculations.

  • DicBeanStatusController:

    Manages the status of the DIC (Dissolved Inorganic Carbon) bean, allowing toggling and retrieval of its status.

  • DocBeanStatusController:

    Manages the status of the DOC (Dissolved Organic Carbon) bean, allowing toggling and retrieval of its status.

  • RiverController:

    Represents a placeholder for potential future functionalities related to rivers.

  • SpeciesController:

    Retrieves information about all available species in the Pandora system.

These controllers are responsible for processing incoming HTTP requests, interacting with the underlying services, and returning appropriate responses to the clients.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.pandora
    The com.pandora package contains the main class for the Pandora Calculation Rest API application.
    com.pandora.controllers.requestbodies
    The com.pandora.controllers.requestbodies package contains classes and interfaces related to request bodies used in PANDORA for cell-based calculations.
    com.pandora.controllers.responsebodies
    The responsebodies package contains classes and interfaces related to the response bodies returned by the PANDORA controllers.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CellController
    The CellController class serves as a Spring MVC controller handling HTTP requests related to cell calculations.
    DicBeanStatusController
    The DicBeanStatusController class serves as a Spring MVC controller handling HTTP requests related to the status of the DIC bean.
    DocBeanStatusController
    The DocBeanStatusController class serves as a Spring MVC controller handling HTTP requests related to the status of the DOC bean.
    RiverController
    The RiverController class serves as a Spring MVC controller handling HTTP requests related to river information.
    SpeciesController
    The SpeciesController class handles HTTP requests related to species information.
